H3.text: who plays at the prudential center in newark. New Jersey Devils

A4.text: Prudential Center is the home of the New Jersey Devils of the National Hockey League (NHL)

A5.text: Prudential Center is the home court of the NCAA's Seton Hall Pirates men's basketball team

A6.text: The Devils opened their new arena, the Prudential Center, on October 27, 2007, against Ottawa after opening the season with a nine-game road trip.

A7.text: The Devils are one of four major professional sports teams that play their home games in New Jersey; the others are the National Football League's New York Giants and New York Jets, and the New York Red Bulls of Major League Soccer.
